subject: Dear Sir,
body:
Dear Sir,
I am writing to inform you that your compensation payment of US$1,750,000,00 has been approved by the Board and Directors of ECOWAS Committee on Rewards and Compensation.
You are therefore advised to reconfirm your details,( contact address/telephone number )   to enable the financial department release your payment to you without any delay.
We look forward for your prompt response.
Thank you.
Phillip Chukwu

subject: Re:   Dear Sir,
body:
Hello Phillip Chukwu,

Thank you for your message. It's great to hear about the approval of my payment by the ECOWAS Committee on Rewards and Directors Board. 

Could you please provide more details about this payment? I'm curious to know how this came about as it was quite unexpected.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Albina
